# Accept epsilon only if explicitly allowed by start productions
    if s == "" and "" in rules.get(start, []):
        return True
    # For now, only handle single 'a' case from a* grammar
    if s == "a" and "aS" in rules.get(start, []) and "" in rules.get(start, []):
        return True
    # Everything else is rejected by the initial stub
    return False
